name: Wendy Call
text: I love that we can get whatever we want on our pizza.  This time I was surprised at the perfect crispness of the crust.  Sometimes the edges are burnt and the center is soggy, but not this time.  What's better is that I had a deal on the app.  I got a free drink with my pizza.  It can't get better than that!

name: Kara Scanlon
text: This is one of the best locations in the area because it's not super full and has lots of seating! I love all the choices especially the spicy sauce and artichokes. The staff is super friendly here, too!

name: Rob Rodriguez
text: Great pizza .....don't know any other restaurants that have my favorite beer Shiner Bock..and the manager aways goes out of her way to make us feel welcome

name: Gayle Rose
text: One of the best pizza places in the city. I am never disappointed with the food and service is good! Fun environment. Great casual place with excellent food.

name: Reece Lemmon
text: The pizzas here are delicious. They are assembled in front of you so everyone can get exactly what they want. The crust and ingredients are fresh. The service was fast and friendly, but the prep area was a little messy and the crew seemed ‚Ä¶More

name: James William
text: It's all its cracked up to be. Authentic  food, authentic service.  All fresh ingredients.  It doesn't get any better in North Beach. There may be "just as good" at some of the other premium North  Beach eateries. But this one is definitely up for your To Do do list.

name: Brian Ramirez

A huge amount of pizzas outside the oven waiting to be put in the oven with all the toppings going bad.  Wouldn't be surprised if we all get sick!

Blaze offers quick cooked pizza made in front of you. Most notably, they offer gluten free pizza with glove changes and separate ovens.

name: Brian Garcia
text: Great addition to South Pasadena. Of course the papa Johns up the street bailed before Blaze opened. It was a smart choice by them because Blaze is everything you can ask for in a pizza. Great flavor, great toppings, and very nice staff. The place doesn't get too packed either.

text: I like the ability to customize your own pizza without having to pay extraordinary add-on fees.
